feature_products.description: We believe that health is the foundation of happiness. Therefore, we are committed to providing high-quality, safe, nutritious products, combining selected natural ingredients and advanced technology. With the criteria of "Quantity + Quality", we are transparent about the origin, publicly test nutrition and comply with international standards. Each jar of bird's nest is not only food, but also a treasure for the health of you and your family.

footer.description: We have what you need for your health.

validation.email: Please enter a valid email address
validation.password: Password must be at least 6 characters
validation.valid: {{field}} only contain letters, numbers and underscores

regex.uppercase: {{field}} must contain at least one uppercase letter
regex.lowercase: {{field}} must contain at least one lowercase letter
regex.number: {{field}} must contain at least one number
regex.special_character: {{field}} must contain at least one special character
